text: @realDonaldTrump U called a nat'l emergency from that point you made it the Fed's gov's responsibility. U failed miserably and should #TrumpResign . US is less than 5% of the world's population but we account for 25% of deaths by #COVID19 in the world. You and this .@WhiteHouse failed abysmally. https://t.co/Ypke2qPiXf
